title: Vertigo
data:
{{version030}}
{{flavour|You are disoriented and dizzy, reducing your accuracy, evasion, and spellcasting success rate.}}

'''Vertigo''' is a temporary [[status effect]] that decreases your [[evasion]] (-5 [[EV]]), [[Spell Success|spellcasting success]], and [[To-hit|accuracy]] (-5 to-hit<ref>{{source ref|0.30.1|attack.cc|213}}</ref>) until it wears off.

Vertigo can be caused when casting [[Alistair's Intoxication]] or as a result of being hit by a plum [[Throw Klown Pie|Killer Klown pie]].

A [[potion of cancellation]] will remove the vertigo status (as well as many other status effects). [[Potions of curing]] have no effect.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.25]], [[miscast]]ing a [[Hexes]] spell could cause 10-20 turns of vertigo.
